title: Suggest any avantgarde modern type
content:
Hi,

I had request for a logotype for a modern caffe bar (something like lounge bar) and they want something modern, avantgarde (their name is Avangard - how surprising).

So any help is needed.  
THANKS.BIG THANKS.
author: garden

comments.content: A clich√© but why not use Avant Garde with the alternates? We all know that the word looks good when set in Avant Garde. ;)
